note.p: Spanish-born army officer, ethnologist, and phrenologist. Served in the Bengal Staff Corps; lieutenant-colonel, 1870; retired as major-general. Non-subscribing member of the Asiatic Society of Bengal from 1873.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1802/39/15)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 7 January 2014)
Proceedings of the Asiatic Society of Bengal (1878), Appendix, p. xxv.
